info.title: Rebooter
info.author: SquidMan
info.details:
Made by SquidMan and thanks to hell_hibou who wrote the code!

Requires:

    * SD card
    * Way of loading the ELF file (Twilight Hack, etc)
    * GameCube controller 

Load the ELF file as needed in order to reboot.

    * Press Z to return to the loader. GameCube Z Button
    * Press R to reboot. GameCube R Trigger.
